itunes:title: Episode 616 - Special Guest Kirill Was Here
title: Episode 616 - Special Guest Kirill Was Here
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back nightlife photographer and party enfluencer Kirill Was Here to discuss why Kirill will always be on social media no matter how bad Instagram and Facebook want him to go away, why the “Call Her Daddy” girls mad...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back nightlife photographer and party enfluencer Kirill Was Here to discuss why Kirill will always be on social media no matter how bad Instagram and Facebook want him to go away, why the “Call Her Daddy” girls made a stupid decision, the 3 imagine a movie starring Matthew McConaughey who plays Jesus, Kirill is moving on from parties to work full time in the merch business, and Kirill shows us some colorful shirts that will not disappoint.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back nightlife photographer and party enfluencer Kirill Was Here to discuss why Kirill will always be on social media no matter how bad Instagram and Facebook want him to go away, why the “Call Her Daddy” girls made a stupid decision, the 3 imagine a movie starring Matthew McConaughey who plays Jesus, Kirill is moving on from parties to work full time in the merch business, and Kirill shows us some colorful shirts that will not disappoint.
